greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d of n such that d-1 also divides n or d-1 = 0.
comment: First differs from A055874 at a(20).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: a:= n-> add(`if`(d=1 or irem(n, d-1)=0, 1, 0), d=divisors(n)):
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 19 2011
